Without access to properly formatted and readable Verilog code, I cannot identify any internal signals, nor can I offer explanations regarding their functions within the module.

2. Descriptions and roles of each internal signal within the module context.

Once the valid code is provided, I can offer precise and valuable assistance in line with your request. Please ensure that the-code is well-formatted and free from corruption or encoding errors.
